channel.title: CVE Feed for Broadcom -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Broadcom -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-38494|2024-07-16T14:42:36.168Z -- broadcom -- symantec%20privileged%20access%20management
item.description: This vulnerability allows a high-privileged authenticated PAM user to achieve remote command execution on the affected PAM system by sending a specially crafted HTTP request.

item.title: CVE-2024-36458|2024-07-15T20:14:40.529Z -- broadcom -- symantec%20privileged%20access%20management
item.description: The vulnerability allows a malicious low-privileged PAM user to perform server upgrade related actions.

item.title: CVE-2024-36457|2024-07-15T18:11:19.432Z -- broadcom -- symantec%20privileged%20access%20management
item.description: The vulnerability allows an attacker to bypass the authentication requirements for a specific PAM endpoint.

item.title: CVE-2024-36458|2024-07-15T13:43:53.687Z -- broadcom -- symantec%20privileged%20access%20management
item.description: The vulnerability allows a malicious low-privileged PAM user to perform server upgrade related actions.

item.title: CVE-2024-38492|2024-07-15T13:54:38.819Z -- broadcom -- symantec%20privileged%20access%20management
item.description: This vulnerability allows an unauthenticated attacker to achieve remote command execution on the affected PAM system by uploading a specially crafted PAM upgrade file.

item.title: CVE-2024-36456|2024-07-15T13:48:06.113Z -- broadcom -- symantec%20privileged%20access%20management
item.description: This vulnerability allows an unauthenticated attacker to achieve remote command execution on the affected PAM system by uploading a specially crafted PAM upgrade file.

item.title: CVE-2024-36455|2024-07-15T13:19:41.914Z -- broadcom -- symantec%20privileged%20access%20management
item.description: An improper input validation allows an unauthenticated attacker to achieve remote command execution on the affected PAM system by sending a specially crafted HTTP request.

item.title: CVE-2024-38491|2024-07-15T13:50:52.327Z -- broadcom -- symantec%20privileged%20access%20management
item.description: The vulnerability allows an unauthenticated attacker to read arbitrary information from the database.

item.title: CVE-2024-36457|2024-07-15T13:39:19.248Z -- broadcom -- symantec%20privileged%20access%20management
item.description: The vulnerability allows an attacker to bypass the authentication requirements for a specific PAM endpoint.

item.title: CVE-2024-36459|2024-06-18T16:44:41.186Z -- broadcom -- symantec%20siteminder
item.description: A CRLF cross-site scripting vulnerability has been identified in certain configurations of the SiteMinder Web Agent for IIS Web Server and SiteMinder Web Agent for Domino Web Server. As a result, an attacker can execute arbitrary Javascript code in a client browser.

item.title: CVE-2024-36459|2024-06-14T12:06:19.298Z -- broadcom -- symantec%20siteminder
item.description: A CRLF cross-site scripting vulnerability has been identified in certain configurations of the SiteMinder Web Agent for IIS Web Server and SiteMinder Web Agent for Domino Web Server. As a result, an attacker can execute arbitrary Javascript code in a client browser.

item.title: CVE-2024-36459|2024-06-21T17:49:24.972Z -- broadcom -- symantec%20siteminder
item.description: A CRLF cross-site scripting vulnerability has been identified in certain configurations of the SiteMinder Web Agent for IIS Web Server and SiteMinder Web Agent for Domino Web Server. As a result, an attacker can execute arbitrary Javascript code in a client browser.

item.title: CVE-2024-38494|2024-07-15T14:03:53.924Z -- broadcom -- symantec%20privileged%20access%20management
item.description: This vulnerability allows a high-privileged authenticated PAM user to achieve remote command execution on the affected PAM system by sending a specially crafted HTTP request.

item.title: CVE-2024-38495|2024-07-15T14:13:12.364Z -- broadcom -- symantec%20privileged%20access%20management
item.description: A specific authentication strategy allows a malicious attacker to learn ids of all PAM users defined in its database.

item.title: CVE-2024-38496|2024-07-15T14:45:45.952Z -- broadcom -- symantec%20privileged%20access%20management
item.description: The vulnerability allows a malicious low-privileged PAM user to access information about other PAM users and their group memberships.

item.title: CVE-2024-38493|2024-07-15T14:26:27.341Z -- broadcom -- symantec%20privileged%20access%20management
item.description: A reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in the PAM UI web interface. A remote attacker able to convince a PAM user to click on a specially crafted link to the PAM UI web interface could potentially execute arbitrary client-side code in the context of PAM UI.

item.title: CVE-2024-36455|2024-07-15T14:48:53.051Z -- broadcom -- symantec%20privileged%20access%20management
item.description: An improper input validation allows an unauthenticated attacker to achieve remote command execution on the affected PAM system by sending a specially crafted HTTP request.

item.title: CVE-2024-38491|2024-07-15T19:27:06.684Z -- broadcom -- symantec%20privileged%20access%20management
item.description: The vulnerability allows an unauthenticated attacker to read arbitrary information from the database.

item.title: CVE-2024-38492|2024-07-16T13:18:28.244Z -- broadcom -- symantec%20privileged%20access%20management
item.description: This vulnerability allows an unauthenticated attacker to achieve remote command execution on the affected PAM system by uploading a specially crafted PAM upgrade file.
